docs.snippet: AS movie houses go, the St. Louis Theater on Grand Avenue in St. Louis used to be one of the less Babylonian temples dedicated to the Moloch of Hollywood. It was big and fancy, but somewhat less ornate than many of the Loew cathedrals that still a...
docs.lead_paragraph: AS movie houses go, the St. Louis Theater on Grand Avenue in St. Louis used to be one of the less Babylonian temples dedicated to the Moloch of Hollywood. It was big and fancy, but somewhat less ornate than many of the Loew cathedrals that still attract worshipers in many big cities of the United States.

docs.snippet: OAKLAND, Calif., Feb. 3 -- Three seconds before the final bell in the 12th round, Jerry Quarry was pummelling Thad Spencer against the ropes today when the referee, Jack Downey, rescued the helpless 7-to-5 favorite by awarding Quarry a technical k...
docs.lead_paragraph: OAKLAND, Calif., Feb. 3 -- Three seconds before the final bell in the 12th round, Jerry Quarry was pummelling Thad Spencer against the ropes today when the referee, Jack Downey, rescued the helpless 7-to-5 favorite by awarding Quarry a technical knockout. Wearing green velvet trunks and a six-day stubble of beard, the 22-year-old Irishman from outside Los Angeles advanced to the title match against Jimmy Ellis in the World Boxing Association heavyweight tournament.
docs.abstract: J Quarry defeats T Spencer to gain title bout with J Ellis in World Boxing Assn (WBA) tourn

headline.main: Quarry Gains Title Final, Stopping Spencer in 12th; A Preview of Things to Come: Quarry Drops Spencer in the Fourth on the Way to Winning in the 12th

docs.snippet: HAVING played well for a solid month, and brought themselves up to within three games of 500 after being 10 below, the New York Knickerbockers begin tonight to face squarely the full depth of the hole they dug for themselves during the first half ...
docs.lead_paragraph: HAVING played well for a solid month, and brought themselves up to within three games of 500 after being 10 below, the New York Knickerbockers begin tonight to face squarely the full depth of the hole they dug for themselves during the first half of the season.

headline.main: Knicks to Play Celtics Tonight To Start Tough 6-Game Stretch

docs.snippet: Three men were arraigned for grand larceny in Criminal Court in Brooklyn yesterday after the Waterfront Commission said its investigators caught them loading a truck on Port Authority Pier 11 at the foot of Hamilton Street with cloth and tin ingot...
docs.lead_paragraph: Three men were arraigned for grand larceny in Criminal Court in Brooklyn yesterday after the Waterfront Commission said its investigators caught them loading a truck on Port Authority Pier 11 at the foot of Hamilton Street with cloth and tin ingots from Thailand on Wednesday night.
docs.abstract: 3 men arraigned for grand larceny after Waterfront Comm investigators caught them loading truck at Bklyn pier with cloth and tin ingots

docs.snippet: CINCINNATI, Jan. 31 (UPI)--Cazzie Russell's jump shot at the buzzer gave the New York Knicks a 128-126 overtime victory over the Cincinnati Royals in a National Basketball Association game tonight....
docs.lead_paragraph: CINCINNATI, Jan. 31 (UPI)--Cazzie Russell's jump shot at the buzzer gave the New York Knicks a 128-126 overtime victory over the Cincinnati Royals in a National Basketball Association game tonight.

headline.main: Knicks Top Royals, 128-126, on Russell Shot in Overtime; BELLAMY SCORING PACES NEW YORK 23-Point Performance Helps Beat Royals--Robertson Tallies 42 for Losers
